title: Development and Effect Analysis of Clinical Case-Based Assessment Tools: ARS-Utilized Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language education theories and assessment methodologies
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environment centered on formative assessment using digital devices and ARS (audience response systems).

learning_goals: Learners can design 10+ clinical case-based assessment items aligned with Bloom’s taxonomy.
Learners can analyze the impact of ARS (audience response system)-based preparatory activities on exam performance.
Learners can interpret statistical indicators (item difficulty, discrimination index, etc.) to evaluate the effectiveness of assessment tools.
Learners can develop practical assessment guides for language education settings through project-based team activities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
